events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking info hasn't updated for days.
System identified the customer message contains keywords related to delivery delay and labeled the issue accordingly.
Support agent has been assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay issue and will be responding shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you track down your package.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the delay?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The last tracking update was from five days ago, and it hasn't moved since.
Thank you for the information. We will contact the shipping carrier immediately and update you within 24 hours on the status.
Thanks, I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to hearing back soon.
We've confirmed your package was delayed due to a transit issue but is now out for delivery today.
Just checking in to make sure you received your order and everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, the laptop arrived yesterday and is working perfectly. Thanks for the excellent support!
The case has been closed as the customer confirmed receipt and satisfaction with the delivered product.
